entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as a ginger cat with a bottle-brush tail. He is chasing a gnome in the garden.

entities.name: gnome
entities.description: The gnome is described as being about ten inches high, with horny little feet and giggling madly as it tries to escape from Crookshanks.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as having his wand out and trying to knock another table out of the air with Charlie.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned as having his wand out and trying to knock Bill's table out of the air.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is cheering on Bill and Charlie as they play with their wands.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is also cheering on Bill and Charlie as they play with their wands.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is laughing at the commotion caused by Bill and Charlie's game.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present in the garden, but her actions are not described.

relationships.description: Crookshanks is chasing the gnome across the yard, trying to catch it.
Bill and Charlie are competing against each other with their wands, trying to knock each other's tables out of the air.
